scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p gen/XYZMika && cp -f node_modules/mikaxyz-xyz/codegen/webgl-fork/XYZMika.WebGLForked.elm gen/XYZMika/WebGL.elm && mkdir -p .ELM_HOME/0.19.1/packages/elm-explorations/webgl && ln -s ../../../../../node_modules/mikaxyz-elm-webgl .ELM_HOME/0.19.1/packages/elm-explorations/webgl/1.1.3
scripts.icons: mkdir -p dist/icons && cp node_modules/boxicons/svg/regular/bx-camera-movie.svg dist/icons && cp node_modules/boxicons/svg/regular/bx-run.svg dist/icons && cp node_modules/boxicons/svg/regular/bx-directions.svg dist/icons
scripts.build: ELM_HOME=.ELM_HOME elm make src/Main.elm --output dist/main.js && npm run fonts && npm run icons && npm run less
